alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Yuma County through 545 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Wray. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Yuma County, including the following locations... Beecher Island. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 228 and 242. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
